verses.verse: The priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881>, even all the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878>, shall have no portion <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with Israel <WH3478>: they shall eat <WH398> the offerings <WH801> of Jehovah <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, and his inheritance <WH5159>.
And they shall have no inheritance <WH5159> among <WH7130> their brethren <WH251>: Jehovah <WH3068> is their inheritance <WH5159>, as he hath spoken unto them <WH1696>.

And this shall be the priests <WH3548>' due <WH4941> from the people <WH5971>, from them that offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2077>, whether it be ox <WH7794> or sheep <WH7716>, that they shall give <WH5414> unto the priest <WH3548> the shoulder <WH2220>, and the two cheeks <WH3895>, and the maw <WH6896>.

The first-fruits <WH7225> of thy grain <WH1715>, of thy new wine <WH8492>, and of thine oil <WH3323>, and the first <WH7225> of the fleece <WH1488> of thy sheep <WH6629>, shalt thou give him <WH5414>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath chosen <WH977> him out of all thy tribes <WH7626>, to stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>, him and his sons <WH1121> for ever <WH3117>.

And if a Levite <WH3881> come <WH935> from any <WH259> of thy gates <WH8179> out of all Israel <WH3478>, where he sojourneth <WH1481>, and come <WH935> with all the desire <WH185> of his soul <WH5315> unto the place <WH4725> which Jehovah <WH3068> shall choose <WH977>;

then he shall minister <WH8334> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> his God <WH430>, as all his brethren <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> do <WH5975>, who stand there before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.
They shall have like portions <WH2506> to eat <WH398>, besides that which cometh of the sale <WH4465> of his patrimony <WH1>.

When thou art come <WH935> into the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee <WH3925>, thou shalt not learn to do <WH6213> after the abominations <WH8441> of those nations <WH1471>.

There shall not be found <WH4672> with thee any one that maketh his son <WH1121> or his daughter <WH1323> to pass <WH5674> through the fire <WH784>, one that useth <WH7080> divination <WH7081>, one that practiseth augury <WH6049>, or an enchanter <WH5172>, or a sorcerer <WH3784>,
or a charmer <WH2266>, or a consulter <WH7592> with a familiar spirit <WH178>, or a wizard <WH3049>, or a necromancer <WH1875>.

For whosoever doeth <WH6213> these things is an abomination <WH8441> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: and because <WH1558> of these abominations <WH8441> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> doth drive them out <WH3423> from before thee <WH6440>.
Thou shalt be perfect <WH8549> with Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

For these nations <WH1471>, that thou shalt dispossess <WH3423>, hearken <WH8085> unto them that practise augury <WH6049>, and unto diviners <WH7080>; but as for thee <WH3068>, Jehovah thy God <WH430> hath not suffered thee so to do <WH5414>.
Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will raise up <WH6965> unto thee a prophet <WH5030> from the midst <WH7130> of thee <WH251>, of thy brethren, like unto me <WH8085>; unto him ye shall hearken;

according to all that thou desiredst <WH7592> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in Horeb <WH2722> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly <WH6951>, saying <WH559>, Let me not hear <WH8085> again <WH3254> the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, neither let me see <WH7200> this great <WH1419> fire <WH784> any more <WH4191>, that I die not.
And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3190>, They have well said that which they have spoken <WH1696>.

I will raise them up <WH6965> a prophet <WH5030> from among <WH7130> their brethren <WH251>, like unto thee <WH5414>; and I will put my words <WH1697> in his mouth <WH6310>, and he shall speak <WH1696> unto them all that I shall command him <WH6680>.
And it shall come to pass <WH376>, that whosoever will not hearken <WH8085> unto my words <WH1697> which he shall speak <WH1696> in my name <WH8034>, I will require it of him <WH1875>.

But the prophet <WH5030>, that shall speak <WH1696> a word <WH1697> presumptuously <WH2102> in my name <WH8034>, which I have not commanded <WH6680> him to speak <WH1696>, or that shall speak <WH1696> in the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods <WH430>, that same prophet <WH5030> shall die <WH4191>.
And if thou say <WH559> in thy heart <WH3824>, How shall we know <WH3045> the word <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath not spoken <WH1696>?

when a prophet <WH5030> speaketh <WH1696> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>, if the thing <WH1697> follow not <WH935>, nor come to pass, that is the thing <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath not spoken <WH1696>: the prophet <WH5030> hath spoken <WH1696> it presumptuously <WH2087>, thou shalt not be afraid of him <WH1481>.
